1370: Eustacius was born in De Tuyt in 1370.
Got married to Gertrudis at age 18 in 1370.
1371: Had a daughter with Gertrudis, Suaneka, at age 19.
1373: Had a daughter with Gertrudis, Sarre, at age 21.
1374: Had a son with Gertrudis, Siccone, at age 22.
1376: Had a son with Gertrudis, Woutgerus, at age 24.
1379: Had a son with Gertrudis, Wederic, at age 27.
1380: Had a daughter with Gertrudis, Reymodis, at age 28.
1385: Had a daughter with Gertrudis, Heile, at age 33.
1389: Lost his wife Gertrudis while she was giving birth to Jacob in 1389.
